list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add recountVoterCounterForRound mutation
- Added an admin/owner tool to recompute finalized voter counters for a round. - Reconciled the sharded counter with aggregated user vote counts to maintain accuracy. - Included permission validation for league owners, managers, and global admins.

task.summary: Default task
middleware adjustments
middleware adjustments
middleware adjustments
league management adjustments
various feature updates
generated convex
enforcement features
ui and responsive fixes
Improve league management permissions
Extend listen tracking to support Spotify and YouTube submissions
Extend listen tracking to support Spotify and YouTube submissions
Extend listen tracking to support timers in Spotify and YouTube submissions

Add troll submission handling and ban functionality
- Allow marking/unmarking of troll submissions. - Annul positive votes for troll submissions, but count negative votes. - Prevent banned users from making submissions. - Add penalties and automatic banning for repeated troll submissions. - Update UI to support troll submission management and indicators.
Fix build error
Update `.idea/` settings and ignore `.idea/` directory
Remove Spotify submission support and adjust logic/UI for YouTube-only handling
remove unncessary component
fixed youtube timer
skip troll submission check
Remove Spotify submission support and update logic/UI for YouTube-only handling

Add audio URL and album art refresh handling for expiring links
- Introduced automatic preemptive refresh for expiring audio URLs and album art. - Preserves playback state and ensures seamless user experience during refresh. - Added new helper utilities to parse and schedule URL expiry-based refreshes.

Improve submission logic for troll handling and timer progress alignment
- Enhanced troll submission management by recomputing troll counts upon marking/unmarking to prevent inflated counts. - Updated membership banning logic to ensure correct troll count tracking and consistent rules for bans. - Refined player timer progress calculation to align with server-side requirements, adding support for both percentage and time limits.
Update `.idea/workspace.xml`: adjust player progress comment and reformat properties component

Refine timer progress logic and duration handling
- Simplify and improve `listenProgress` effect for better initialization and reactivity to track changes. - Introduce robust server-side duration derivation to handle varying submission types (YouTube fallback, malformed files, etc.). - Update YouTube timer management to auto-start/stop based on play state and track switches. - Employ consistent clamping for reported progress across client and server sides.
added missing dep

Add YouTube playlist handling and batch listening progress update
- Introduced server-side mutation for batch completion of listening progress based on YouTube playlist timers. - Enhanced front-end to auto-detect and open YouTube playlists during voting, including timer integration for duration tracking. - Updated `SubmissionsList` and `RoundDetail` components to support YouTube-related logic.
Restrict YouTube playlist display to post-submission phases in `RoundDetail` component

Add admin test data seeding tools and UI
- Implemented comprehensive data seeding logic for leagues, rounds, submissions, and votes with namespace support. - Added support for resetting seeded test data by namespace. - Created an admin-facing UI to trigger seeding and reset operations, with configurable options. - Updated `api.d.ts` to include new admin seed functions.
idea files

Remove YouTube timer logic and enhance playlist handling
- Eliminated per-link YouTube timer logic within `PlayerProgress` and `MusicPlayer` components. - Introduced consolidated YouTube playlist management in `RoundDetail` and `SubmissionsList`. - Enhanced YouTube playlist information display, including inline progress tracking.

Add support for opening YouTube playlists from the queue
- Implemented logic to build and open a YouTube playlist URL from queued submissions. - Enhanced `playNext` behavior to detect and handle YouTube submissions by triggering playlist opening. - Updated `handleEnded` and `onPlayNext` callbacks to incorporate new playlist logic.

Refine YouTube playlist completion logic and timer integration
- Introduced `done` state for YouTube playlists to track completion. - Enhanced `RoundDetail` and `SubmissionsList` components to handle completed playlists with updated UI and logic. - Improved session and local storage handling to persist and detect playlist completion state across sessions. - Added safeguards to prevent restarting completed timers.

Introduce per-round vote limit overrides
- Added support for custom `maxPositiveVotes` and `maxNegativeVotes` values on a per-round basis, defaulting to league limits when not specified. - Updated vote validation and calculations across backend (`rounds`, `votes`, `leagues`) to utilize effective vote limits. - Enhanced `RoundDetail`, `EditRoundDialog`, and `RoundHeader` components to display and manage custom vote limits. - Adjusted schema to include optional per-round vote override fields.

Introduce per-round vote limit overrides
- Added support for custom `maxPositiveVotes` and `maxNegativeVotes` values on a per-round basis, defaulting to league limits when not specified. - Updated vote validation and calculations across backend (`rounds`, `votes`, `leagues`) to utilize effective vote limits. - Enhanced `RoundDetail`, `EditRoundDialog`, and `RoundHeader` components to display and manage custom vote limits. - Adjusted schema to include optional per-round vote override fields.

Remove unnecessary type casting for `round` in vote limit calculations
- Simplified code by removing redundant `(round as any)` type casting. - Updated `RoundDetail` and `EditRoundDialog` components to directly utilize `round` properties for `maxPositiveVotes` and `maxNegativeVotes`. - Ensured cleaner and more maintainable logic while retaining existing functionality.

Remove presubmission functionality
- Eliminated presubmission logic, including mutations, queries, and related schema definitions. - Updated `SubmissionForm` and `SongSubmissionForm` components to simplify submission flow. - Removed unused `presubmissions` table and associated handling in backend logic. - Ensured UI adjustments to reflect the removal of presubmission features and maintain clarity.

Simplify submitter collection logic in `rounds`
- Replaced per-user submission count calculation with a streamlined approach using unique submitter IDs. - Simplified submitter display logic by directly mapping unique submitter IDs to user data. - Retained functionality for required submissions per user while improving code readability and efficiency.

Compare `submissionsPerUser` with effective values to prevent data loss
- Updated logic to default undefined `submissionsPerUser` to 1 for comparison. - Ensured changes to vote limits won't overwrite submission settings in `rounds`. - Improved error handling for submission changes during the voting phase.

Add ownership validation for round updates
- Introduced user authentication and ownership checks for round modifications. - Enforced permission restrictions to ensure only league creators or global admins can update rounds.

Update `.idea/` workspace configuration
- Adjusted tasks and changelist comments to reflect recent round update validation changes. - Updated LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE and local task counter for consistency.

Enhance submission tracking and display logic
- Implemented per-user submission count tracking to identify users who completed required submissions. - Updated submitter calculations to only include users meeting the submission requirements. - Enhanced UI in `RoundDetail` to show completed and missing submitters, improving clarity for league members. - Adjusted submission count displays in `RoundListItem` to reflect accurate data.

Improve external link handling and listen requirement display logic
- Updated listen percentage calculation to default to 100% when not provided. - Enhanced messaging for YouTube links to clarify tracking and playback instructions. - Added validation for external links before enabling the play button. - Adjusted tooltips and error messages to accurately reflect listen requirements.
updated packages
updated packages

Streamline submission and league member counting logic
- Integrated sharded counters for lightweight submission and member counts. - Avoided heavy database scans by sampling submissions and approximating submitter count. - Updated `RoundListItem` to derive submitter counts with improved efficiency. - Removed redundant voter processing for rounds to prevent large reads.
rounds improvements

Add sharded voter counter and improve voting logic
- Introduced a `voterCounter` to track finalized voters efficiently using sharded counters. - Updated voting logic to increment voter count upon completion of all votes. - Adjusted `rounds` logic to fetch voter count dynamically during the voting phase for improved scalability.

Add sharded voter counter and dynamic voting logic
- Introduced a `voterCounter` for efficient tracking of finalized voters using sharded counters. - Updated voting logic to increment voter count upon completion of all votes. - Adjusted `rounds` logic to fetch voter count dynamically during the voting phase for scalability improvements.

Add recountVoterCounterForRound mutation
- Added an admin/owner tool to recompute finalized voter counters for a round. - Reconciled the sharded counter with aggregated user vote counts to maintain accuracy. - Included permission validation for league owners, managers, and global admins.
